attributes.action: Help provide better government support for the scouting community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a member of the scout association, i believe that the government can do more to help encourage more young people to join the scouting movement. it would not only raise prospects to young people, but help give give them a sense of pride and teach them skills that will help them thought their life. so with better awareness and financial support the government can help
